summary: A brilliant but troubled New Zealand chess champion finds purpose by teaching underprivileged children about the rules of chess and life.
cast: Cliff Curtis|James Rolleston|Kirk Torrance|Miriama McDowell|Barry Te Hira|Xavier Horan|Wayne Hapi|Lyel Timu|Te Ahorangi Retimana-Martin|Calae Hignett-Morgan|Te Rua Rehu-Martin|Niwa Whatuira|Lionel Wellington|Wesley Broadfoot|Tuhoe Isaac|Sia Trokenheim|Andrew Grainger|Shaden Te Huna|Dante Nathuran|Pat Napier|Kuli Tonga|Quade Roiri|John Leigh|Shane Rangi|Thomas Kiwi|Jim Marbrook|Jon Brazier|Karlos Wrennall|Rachel House|Patricia Wichman|Shane Dawson|John Robertson|Shane 'Jedi' Fitzgerald|James Napier Robertson|Andrew Stehlin|Marietta Apulu|Christopher Kessell|Jacob Yetton|Roseanne Liang|Joseph Oliveira
title: The Dark Horse
